revised_title: Optical Properties of Quinine and Cinchonidin Alkaloids and Their Iodo-Compounds
tldr: The author investigates the optical properties of quinine and cinchonidin alkaloids and their iodo-compounds. He discovers that quinidin possesses fluorescence, while cinchonidin does not. The author also describes the formation and properties of various crystal forms of these compounds, including their optical doubly absorbent powers.
